name: Essential Road Long Sleeve Jersey - Men's

features: A breathable, high-wicking long-sleeve jersey made almost entirely from recycled fibers certified by GRS(Global Recycled Standard)(both polyester and elastane)
Three rear pockets give plenty of space to store ride essentials and a smaller zipped pocket is ideal for secure storage of a smartphone
A soft collar enhances comfort, while elastic at the bottom hem ensures the jersey stays securely in place for the duration of a ride
A full-length zipper at the front
